element.name: Facility City
element.definition: The city where the facility is located (physical address).
element.v3Comment:
City codes are based on GNIS Feature Class. The primary Feature Class to use is "Civil" with "Populated Place" and "Military" code as additional options.
Definitions for each GNIS City Feature Class can be found on the GNIS Codes website.
GNIS Codes Website: http://geonames.usgs.gov/domestic/download_data.htm
Used to populate dFacility.08 Facility City.

asserts.assert: Type of Facility, Facility Location Code, Facility Street Address, Facility City, and Facility State should be a unique combination for each facility.
